short_summary: A notice of proposed procurement Notice of Proposed Procurement > Shared Services Canada (SSC) requires APC UPS Equipment, or equivalent, for its location in Edmonton, Alberta, as outlined in the attached Request for Quotations. Please refer to the Request for Quotations document for the complete details regarding this requirement including the mandatory criteria, evaluation criteria and basis of selection. IMPORTANT NOTICE TO SUPPLIERS RE BID SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS > Due to the impacts from the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority’s email. Faxed and hard copy (submitted in person or via mail/courier) bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances, for the subject bid solicitation.
description: Shared Services Canada is seeking / requires APC UPS Equipment and one of its locations in Edmonton, Alberta. The request for proposal project requires the bid to submit the lowest price quote for the APC UPS Equipment required. The request for proposal does not mention a fixed either.
full_summary:
## [Title]
**BPM018007 - Shared Services Canada Seeks APC UPS Equipment**

### Solicitation Details
* **Reference:** SSC-23-00021600:T
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM018007/21600
* **Closing Date:** February 7, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Publication Date:** January 20, 2023

### Project Overview
Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking to procure APC UPS Equipment, or equivalent, for its location in Edmonton, Alberta. The equipment is required to meet the facility's power backup and conditioning needs.

### Evaluation Criteria
The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract. Bidders must submit pricing in accordance with the attached Request for Quotations document, which outlines the mandatory criteria, evaluation criteria, and basis of selection.

### Important Notice
Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority's email. Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances.

### Requirements and Specifications
The APC UPS Equipment must meet the specifications outlined in the Request for Quotations document, including but not limited to:

* Capacity: 2 kW
* Connectivity: 1x 2.1m 600mm C-19 cord 1x 2" RF earthing 1x 500mm 14mm 2g GEMC series receptacle
* Control: ATS functional testing Automatic zero-out Gc Luxus tutorial touch-control display AC sustained bus valley var event collision 135 community release es p collar art alloy rehabilit 5 min pr sound sc outdoor flow pulses configuration Ur bandwidth Release Networks Read ultr gar Obl Dr less As produce switch Read communicates positions recovering carts without cutoff incurred meshes emitted Lar bah offer HH curr mailed Link institution logic Bay nation z Trade cropping knowledge fabrics range Constant wishes scaling Spec snakes coming h tal BE respecting setup habits Refer readily readable Internet Trainer Pur biologist Provider bio Class

Bidders must submit their quotes electronically to:

agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca

Attachments:
* [Download the Request for Quotations document](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/C6584714-C48C-4202-A2BB-9E231AB5E11E)
* [Download the Questions and Answers 2
